node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | AVL, NC | 09/26/19 - 09/29/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: July 8, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: September 26-29
node._chi_workshop_description: Join Danny Dreyer, Founder of ChiRunning and ChiWalking in this Instructor Training that culminates in a 4-day workshop in the Asheville, North Carolina: September 26-29, 2019. The course begins with a Home Study Program that starts July 8, 2019. Why not make a living doing what you love? As a Certified ChiRunning or ChiWalking Instructor, you’ll experience the joy of teaching other runners and walkers to move their bodies in a mindful, more efficient and less harmful way. We welcome you to join our team; a dedicated and enthusiastic group of individuals who know that pain-free fitness is not a dream, but in fact a reality. For a full explanation of the Instructor Training Program, visit the Become an Instructor Page here.  Once you have completed payment, you will sign the Agreement and fill out the Registration Form at the bottom of the page.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop June 15, San Francisco
node.title: 06/15/19 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 15 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $130 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $140 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node.title: ChiRunning Workshop - June 30, 2019 - Marc Waxman
node.excerpt: Come learn ChiRunning with Coach Marc's special approach honed through years of teaching experience!
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This is a great location with easy access and easy parking with a great outdoor running trail as well as great indoor space.
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!

​I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Free Mini-clinic @ Marathon Sports in Mansfield
node.title: June 26, 2019 - ChiRunning Miniclinic - Marc Waxman
node.excerpt: Discounts to Marc's upcoming workshops for all participants!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Free ChiRunning Mini Workshop with Senior Certifying ChiRunning/ChiWalking Instructor Marc Waxman

DISCOUNTS TO UPCOMING CHIRUNNING WORKSHOPS FOR ALL PARTICIPANTS!

 

A complimentary ChiRunning mini-workshop with Marc Waxman.  ChiRunning is a natural running technique, aimed to reduce injury and improve personal performance.  ChiRunning takes its guidance from the inner design of T’ai Chi which asks us to move the body in a natural order, where the big muscles do the heavy lifting, the smaller muscles do less and the tiniest muscles do very little.  The mission of ChiRunning is to help you LOVE running forever.

 

About Marc

Marc is an avid runner with regular podium finishes.  In his forties he ran a 2:51 PR in the Boston Marathon and successfully completed 50-mile ultramarathons.  Marc has been practicing ChiRunning for many years and credits it for his ability to run 2,500 injury-free miles every year.  

Learn more about Coach Marc at www.113enterprises.com

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop July 13, San Francisco
node.title: 07/13/19 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 15 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $130 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $140 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning: Pre Training for the YMCA MONTCLAIR 10K!
node.title: 05/28/19 ChiRunning Workshop Joel Matalon
node._chi_workshop_description:
Rock ? the YMCA MONTCLAIR 10K!

CHOREOGRAPH YOUR BEST RUN Joel Matalon will guide you on the principles of ChiRunning and the RUNhabX™ (RUNning Habits for X-ordinary Performance) based form and technique on the course itself. $35 must be paid by Fri, May 24th Minimum 5 paid participants needed.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No refunds.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | Hong Kong, China | 10/02/19 - 10/05/19 | Harrison Wong
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: July 15, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: October 2-5
node._chi_workshop_description:
Become a ChiRunning Certified Instructor to help others to enjoy running injury-free and effortlessly; treat ChiRunning as your career and your mission by promoting this revolutionary running system to benefit more people. The ChiRunning Instructor Certification System has been continuously improved and improved over the past two decades, ensuring the integrity of each instructor and becoming a dual affirmation of running skills and training proficiency. Take immediate action, join the ranks of professional coaches!
Fee inclusive of:
  • Instructor Manual
  • 3 ChiRunning books, 2 DVDs, 1 Metronome
  • 4 days practical training camp (with daily complimentary lunch and coffee break)
  • Certificate of completion
  • 1 ChiRunning Instructor Tee
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | Freiburg, Germany | 10/31/19 - 11/3/19 | Bernhard Schittich
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: August 12, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: October 21-November 2, 2019
node._chi_workshop_description:
Use this extraordinary opportunity in a wonderful atmosphere to lay the foundation for your lifelong ChiRunning practice and start your own business. ChiRunning has a lot of potential and is becoming more and more popular in German-speaking countries. Become part of our great team, we need good instructors to serve the demand! As a certified instructor, runners help overcome pain, make running injuries history, and find their own center. This is a contribution to a better world. And you yourself are technically always on the ball through the teaching and you will understand a little better with each course, why the Raramuri say "running is controlled falling" The end:
  • Registration by 12th August 2019 at the latest
  • Three-month self-study of the teaching materials, including first teaching
  • Workshop from 31.10. until 03.11. 2019 in Freiburg
  • Practice: teaching, recording videos of teaching and running
  • Submit the documents
  • certification
Register by email: mail@running-moments.de.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | London, England | 11/07/19 - 11/10/19 | Gray Caws
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: July 7, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: November 7-10, 2019
node._chi_workshop_venue: The Adventures Studio @ One Yoga London
node._chi_workshop_description:
Do you love to run? Would you love to share that passion with others? The ChiRunning Instructor Training Programme will help you hone your running technique, and provide you with the skillset to coach others.

As a qualified ChiRunning Instructor you will enjoy a wonderful business opportunity, becoming part of a growing network dedicated to inspiring and empowering runners of all levels. The Programme comprises…
  • Access to a comprehensive online training course and teaching materials
  • A 4-day practical workshop covering advanced technique and teacher training
  • 2 one-to-one sessions with the UK director, delivered online or in-person
The Programme delivers…
  • An in-depth understanding of the key principles and components of the ChiRunning technique
  • The teaching cues, drills and exercises to teach ChiRunning lessons including posture, breathing, video observation, hill running, speed with ease, training programme development
  • An understanding of basic anatomy and physiology including an overview of the kinetic chain, muscle sling systems and myofascial meridians
  • An understanding of the importance of, and science behind, a mindful approach to exercise
  • An introduction to basic business development and connection to the network of world-wide ChiRunning Instructors
  • The opportunity to improve your own personal practice
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node.title: ChiRunning, 101
node._chi_workshop_description: Curious about ChiRunning but are not ready to commit to a 4 hour workshop... this course is perfect for you! We will learn proper posture, arm-swing, foot placement, and cadence in this condensed version of the four hour workshop. A great way to start to improve you running form today!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: There are no refunds but I would be happy to move you to a different date if a schedule conflict arises.

node._chi_workshop_name: Half Day ChiRunning Workshop, SOLD OUT
node.title: Half Day ChiRunning Workshop, SOLD OUT
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop is Sold Out
node._chi_workshop_address: 611 North Lynndale Drive, lower level, suite F
node._chi_workshop_description:
I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body.  You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  You will also be videotaped at the beginning of the workshop.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills … the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • Video Analysis of your form at the beginning of class
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: There are no refunds, but I would be happy to transfer you to another workshop that I teach or work with you individually.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRun, walk and hike: Costa Brava Trail Adventures
node.title: 10/02/19 ChiRun and ChiWalk Retreat Gray Caws
node.excerpt: Discover your true sense of being, exploring the stunning forest and coastal trails on this Costa Brava Trail Adventure. Immerse yourself in this unique challenge to sight-see on foot. Feel a sense of achievement, re-energise your mind and body.
node._chi_workshop_description:
[caption id="attachment_7228" align="alignnone" width="300"] ChiRun Costa Brava Trail Adventure with Gray Caws.[/caption]

Discover your true sense of being, exploring the stunning forest and coastal trails on this Costa Brava Trail Adventure. Escape the every-day and immerse yourself in this unique challenge to sight-see on foot. Feel a sense of satisfaction and achievement, reenergise your mind and body.

The Costa Brava Trail Adventure is organised by the Director of ChiRunning UK, Gray Caws, alongside the formidable trail runner and local guide Pablo Rodriguez of www.runningcostabrava.com. Running Costa Brava has received recommendations on TripAdvisor and featured in RunnersWorld UK and London Metro. You’ll spend each day outdoors surrounded by beautiful scenery as you travel from place to place either running, walking or hiking. You’ll stay in top-quality accommodation, sample excellent local cuisine, experience true Catalan culture, and enjoy the company of like-minded people. Suitable for all levels of ability and fitness. We don’t care about calories, performance or heart rate, we are about traveling on foot. We believe we are social animals, we travel as a team, at a different pace sometimes but no one is left behind. Humans are tribal. We are a tribe of adventurers. This is no place for competition. Places are limited to ensure complete personal attention. Included: Transfers from Girona Barcelona Airport, hotel accommodation, all meals (drinks not included), all tuition and guided trail runs. Not included: Flights, insurance.

What makes this adventure different?

Because Pablo is local this adventure holds the essence of true Catalonian philosophy. You are joining this adventure a traveler rather than a tourist. That’s the difference between us and other companies. Run, explore, discover the joy of freedom and happiness
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
1. Deposit: Your booking must be accompanied by a deposit of £125 per person, or if booked within 12 weeks of the date on which the trip starts by the full payment. This deposit is non-refundable if you choose to cancel. You will be sent a booking confirmation receipt together with a questionnaire to help your coach tailor the activities to your needs.
  2. Balance of payment: This is due 12 weeks prior to the activity start date by bank transfer. If full payment is not received by this date N8Works Ltd reserves the right to cancel your booking without a refund of the deposit made.
  3. Client cancellation: If you wish to cancel you must notify N8Works Ltd in writing, whereupon the following charges will be applied from the date they receive your notice of cancellation: More than 12 weeks before start date – loss of deposit. Between 8 and 12 weeks before start date – 50% of fee or loss of deposit, whichever amount is greater. Less than 8 weeks (56 days) before start date – full fee.
  4. Trip cancellation: If N8Works Ltd has to cancel a booking we shall refund all monies or the client can re-book on a different date. If N8Works Ltd cancels an activity we will not be liable for any expenses that you may have incurred as a result of your booking, or in the expectation of the activity taking place.
Please contact us for full terms and condtions
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: I can now officially conclude that this has been the best holiday of my life. And there are lots of factors that go into that... The location was breathtaking. Every peak, twist and turn of the Catalonian countryside left me gasping in awe. The skies so clear, the sun so warm, the seas so blue and the landscapes so vivid. And in running I really felt like I saw parts of this wonderful place that even the locals don't know exist… After so many weeks and months of trying – I really feel like I have found my stride.

node.title: Chi Running Hills & Trails, San Francisco
node._chi_workshop_description:
Chi Running Hills and Trails Workshop Take the strain and struggle out of hill running with this ChiRunning Hills and Trails Workshop.  It will increase your ability to conserve energy on the uphills, reduce impact on the downhills, and enjoy the views from the top pain-free. Many people struggle with hills because they see uphills as more work and downhills as more impact. With ChiRunning hills can be fun, especially when you run them using technique and not leg strength. The key to running hills and trails is to both adapt your basic ChiRunning technique and apply some additional techniques. You’ll learn how to:
  • Use your upper body to reduce your legwork
  • Run downhill with less impact while gaining speed
  • Make uphill running easier with relaxation techniques
  • Prevent injury and over-exertion
  • Apply special techniques to steep hills
  • Make modifications for steep downhils
  • Have more fun with less effort!
In the Hills and Trails workshop we take the same concepts that were learned on the flat and pavement and apply, with some important modifications, to hills and dirt. These modifications and some additional techniques are used to promote energy efficiency and injury prevention when running either hilly pavement or trails. This workshop will expand on concepts that you learned in a Basics ChiRunning workshop.  It is therefore a requirement that participants complete a ChiRunning workshop or private session with a Certified Instructor before signing up for a Hills and Trails workshop.   Notes:  The workshop is limited to 6 participants so you will get lots of personal attention. Hazel Wood, the instructor has extensive experience running hills and trails.  Some of the highlights of her trail running include:
  • 38 Dipsea races in the Invitational Group with 3 Black Shirts for finishing in the top 35
  • Two time 1stPlace in age group at Headlands 50K, one time second place
  • Five 50K races
  • One 50 mile race
  • And several other distances
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancel 7 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $75 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $85 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 7 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year.

node.title: ChiRunning and walking Bali Retreat (05/07/2020-05/14/2020) Gray Caws
node._chi_workshop_description:
Join Master Instrucctor Gray Caws for a retreat in May 2020 on the Indonesian island of Bali. Early morning walks and runs, daily yoga, massage, mountain hiking, and freshly-prepared traditional meals. Exclusive use of traditional Balinese cottages and pool with private chef, set in the rice fields just north of Ubud.

The 5 Elements of Mindful Movement takes the elements that formed the basis of analysis in both Hinduism and Buddhism (earth, water, fire, air, and space) and applies these to functional movement and breath practice. The retreat includes (subject to change) ✓ Airport transfers ✓ 7 nights accommodation in comfortable Balinese cottages with an outdoor pool ✓ Breakfast plus a main meal of either lunch or dinner ✓ Daily ChiRunning practice plus early-morning runs including the Ubud Ridgewalk and rice fields ✓ Daily yoga sessions ✓ Daily meditation/breathwork based on Buteyko and Oxygen Advantage techniques ✓ Function movement practice ✓ 3 treatment options including Balinese, Thai, and deep tissue massage ✓ Traditional cookery class ✓ Sunrise hike to Mount Batur We have exclusive use of the complex which is set in the rice fields about 15/20 mins drive to Ubud, known for its traditional crafts and dance. Choice of accommodation includes double rooms, bungalows with garden view and a family bungalow with 2 double rooms. Not included ✓ Airfare ✓ Travel insurance Clients are required to have appropriate health and travel insurance and all relevant vaccinations. We are staying in traditional Balinese cottages so be prepared for wildlife around. The cottages have mosquito nets and fans. There is no air conditioning. There is wifi but we are in the middle of a rice field so it not necessarily going the be the fastest connection. Optional extras ✓ Motorbike hire ✓ Spa treatments including foot massage, body scrub, acupressure, manicure or pedicure ✓ Tarot reading ✓ Astrology reading ✓ Massage course ✓ Additional sightseeing tours
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Click here for full terms and conditions

node.title: 08/10/19 - ChiRunning - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will sell out. Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node.title: CWIT | Online Program | 08/02/19 - 12/04/19 | Katherine Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: October 1, 2019 | Program: October 2 – December 4, 2019
node._chi_workshop_description:
Join Katherine Dreyer, Co-Founder of ChiRunning and ChiWalking in a virtual ChiWalking Instructor Training.

For a full explanation of the Instructor Training Program, visit the Become an Instructor Page here.  Once you have completed the payment, you will sign need to sign the NDA and fill out the Registration Form at the bottom of that page. This is required before you can be officially enrolled in the course and receive your study materials. 
Why not make a living doing what you love? As a ChiWalking Instructor, you’ll experience the joy of teaching other walkers to move their bodies in a mindful, more efficient and less harmful way. We welcome you to join our team; a dedicated and enthusiastic group of individuals who know that pain-free fitness is not a dream but in fact a reality.
The benefits include but are not limited to:
  • Get paid to teach individuals and groups the ChiWalking techniques
  • Lead group walks or start a ChiWalking club 
  • Get partner commissions from ChiRunning and ChiWalking product sales
  • Use of the trademarked ChiWalking logos for marketing
  • Free customizable listing on the ChiWalking website
  • Opportunity to market your workshops on the Chi Website (additional fee of $200 per year for as many workshops as you want to list) 
  • Participation in ChiLiving blogs and social media
  • Member of our worldwide Certified Instructor community and our private Certified Instructor facebook page. 
  • Access to customizable marketing materials (Business Cards, Flyers, etc.)
  • Join ChiRunning and ChiWalking Instructors at Instructor Weekend, usually hosted in North Carolina in November every 2 years. The next Instructor Weekend is planned for November 12-15, 2020. Set aside the date now. It is 2.5 days of inspiration, learning and collaborating with Certified Instructors from all over the world! 
  • Deepen your own ChiWalking practice and have the tools to keep healthy, balanced and moving for the rest of your life.
When you complete your registration you'll receive:
  • PDF of the ChiWalking Instructor Manual
  • The ChiWalking book (Simon & Schuster 2006) (If you are a candidate outside the U.S. you'll receive a digital version.)
  • PDF of the ChiWalking Workbook
  • Digital access to the ChiWalking and Chi Walk-Run DVD
  • Digital ChiWalking Audio Program
  • PDF of the ChiWalking Practice Teaching Log
Webinar Meeting Dates/Times:

October 2, 2019, 4 pm EDT October 16, 2019, 4 pm EDT October 30, 2019, 4 pm EDT November 13, 2019, 4 pm EST December 4, 2019, 4 pm EST

For a full explanation of the Instructor Training Program, visit the Become an Instructor Page here.  Once you have completed the payment, you will sign need to sign the NDA and fill out the Registration Form at the bottom of that page. This is required before you can be officially enrolled in the course and receive your study materials.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: Up to 30 days before the final registration date, you can receive a full refund minus $125 cancellation fee. Within 30 days of the start of the online course, there's no refund, but your investment can be used toward a future Training.

node.title: ChiRunning 101
node._chi_workshop_description: Learn the very basics of ChiRunning in this condensed version of the full workshop. We will chat about proper posture, cadence, arm swing, and foot placement. A must for those that are curious about the ChiRunning technique!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: There are no refunds but I will do my best to transfer your entry into another workshop.

node.title: 09/07/19 Chi Running Ed Malley
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run with great efficiency and reduce or even eliminate injuries for the rest of your life. In this Workshop, you will learn the essential skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, fun and inspiring. This workshop includes a VIDEO GAIT ANALYSIS at the beginning and conclusion of the workshop. Handouts and Ed's detailed analysis by email are also included. What you’ll get:
  • The Keys to Efficient, Injury-Eliminating Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • ChiRunning versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the ChiRunning Form
  • Injury Prevention Techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative Technique Drills
  • How to Conserve Energy at Any Speed
Please contact me (ed@runwalkcoach.com) if you have any questions regarding the workshop.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancel 14 days before the day of the workshop and I'll refund 100% of the workshop fee, or you can use it for a future workshop with me within one year with no penalty.
If you cancel within 14 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop with me within one year.
Should I need to reschedule the workshop (typically weather related), you can reschedule to another workshop or receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Thanks for the pictures and thanks for the workshop. Was fun, inspirational and very instructive. (After the workshop) I actually went for a 10k run…Came out feeling very refreshed and not sore at all.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Ed’s training helped me successfully start running again after 25 years. His chi training is superb and his passion for nature and people is contagious.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value: Running pain free for a 55 year old guy with 4 knee surgeries (not running related) is a miracle.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote30value: Today I did my first Chi long run (a 10-miler) and it felt great! For most of the run I felt like I could keep going forever. When I reached the end, my muscles and joints weren’t fatigued. It was really enjoyable. Thanks again for showing us the light.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | AVL, NC | 04/30/20 - 05/03/20 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: August 13, 2020 | 4-day Immersive Program: Nov 19-22, 2020
node._chi_workshop_description: Join Danny Dreyer, Founder of ChiRunning and ChiWalking in this Instructor Training that culminates in a 4-day workshop in the Asheville, North Carolina: April 30 through May 3, 2020. The course begins with a Home Study Program that starts on February 6, 2020. Why not make a living doing what you love? As a Certified ChiRunning or ChiWalking Instructor, you’ll experience the joy of teaching other runners and walkers to move their bodies in a mindful, more efficient and less harmful way. We welcome you to join our team; a dedicated and enthusiastic group of individuals who know that pain-free fitness is not a dream but in fact a reality. For a full explanation of the Instructor Training Program, visit the Become an Instructor Page here.  Once you have completed the payment, you will sign the Agreement and fill out the Registration Form at the bottom of the page.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop October 12, San Francisco
node.title: 10/12/19 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 15 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $130 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $140 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node.title: November 3, 2019 - ChiRunning - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will sell out. Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node._chi_workshop_name: Chi Bootcamp Class in Washington Square Park, NY
node.title: Chi Bootcamp Class in Washington Square Park, NY
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Meet at Eva's Kitchen, but workout is in Washington Sq Park
node._chi_workshop_description: East meets West in this fitness and wellness bootcamp. Melding the inner focus and grace of tai chi movements combined with high energy muscle pumping exercise, we will have you fully engaged and energized to meet your day with power and vitality. When: 9/9 to 10/17, classes are weekly on Monday & Thursday for 6 weeks (10 classes) No Class on 9/30 (Rosh Hashanah) and 10/14 (Columbus Day) Time: 9:30 to 10:30 am Bag Drop: You are welcome to leave your personal belongings at Eva’s Cost: $25 per class OR $200 for the full series of 10 (2 Classes Free) Register: RUNhabX@joefitnessworld.com After each class, complimentary coffee/tea plus a protein muffin will be served.  BONUS: Registrants for the full series will receive 1 free meal from Eva’s delicious and nutritious menu during the Bootcamp series!  Exp 10/31 Instructors Joshua Margolis (Mind Over Matter) is a personal trainer with a Bachelor’s Degree in Sports Psychology. He holds certifications from A.C.E., A.I.F.E., and N.A.S.M, and is also prenatal and postpartum fitness certified. Joshua has been working in the health and fitness arena for over 8 years designing personalized fitness programs which incorporate motivational techniques to enhance performance. Joel Matalon creator of RUNhabX is a Master Chi Running™, Chi Walking™ instructor, certifying Master, and is the Director of Continuing Ed at ChiLiving, Inc. He’s an ACE life and health coach, personal trainer and group fitness instructor. He’s also a Spartan Race™ coach and Speedball Fitness™ coach and the 2017 Fitness Idol.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No refunds

node.title: 10/12/19 Half Day ChiRunning Workshop Amelia Vrabel
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique. You will be guided through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you’re in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills… the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
This event is sold out, but please contact me using the form below to be added to the wait list and for information on future events. Thanks!

node._chi_workshop_name: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique
node.title: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique / 10-05-19 / ChiWalk-Run Workshop / Max Logan
node._chi_workshop_description: This workshop is an introduction to CiWalking and ChiRunning. You will get to see how this revolutionary technique can help you learn to fitness walk and run safely and with energy efficiency. Come have fun again and get fit without the fear of injury and with energy to spare!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No cancellation policy as workshop is free.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: I really enjoyed fitness walking but the longer I walked the more my back hurt. I learned through ChiCoaching that my problem was my foot alignment was affecting my back. Also, by leading with my legs and striking with my heel landing I was really putting a pounding on my spine. I have now learned though prating my Chi-Posture I no longer feel the pain in my back and I am so much lighter on my feet!

node._chi_workshop_name: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and Running Technique
node.title: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique / 10-19-19 / ChiWalk-Run / Max Logan
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come learn how the most revolutionary running and fitness walking technique, ChiRunning and ChiWalking will change how you view the effects of injury and energy efficiency on your workout practice.
You will learn the difference between traditional running and fitness walking and how the ChiRunning and ChiWalking technique will allow you take your practice to a whole new level without the fear of injury and with greater stamina as your body moves more efficiently.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Event is FREE
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: I couldn't believe how light I was on my feet. I always had a heavy landing on my feet and doing my workouts was a chore. As a triathlete, the eventI hated most was the running. Now using the Chi technique, it has really changed my mind. I now look forward to the challenge!

node.title: Half Day ChiRunning Workshop
node._chi_workshop_address: 611 North Lynndale Drive, lower level, suite F
node._chi_workshop_description:
I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body.  You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  You will also be videotaped at the beginning of the workshop.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills … the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • Video Analysis of your form at the beginning of class
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: There are no refunds, but I would be happy to transfer you to another workshop that I teach or work with you individually.

node.title: 10/05/19 Free Talk Jean Gillis
node._chi_workshop_description:
Run Better, Without Injury! Do you enjoy running, but always get injured? Does running feel to hard, and you become easily winded? Or are you a beginning runner and you're not sure where to start? Then I invite you to to this free introduction ChiRunning! This technique is a gentle but powerful approach that makes getting fit, safe, easy, and fun. It’s great for all levels of fitness and experience.
You don't need to be in full running gear, but please wear sneakers if you want to participate in the drills
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No cancellation policy as workshop is free.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "In May 2019, I was sent to the Massachusetts Army National Guard Warrior FIT program where I met Jean. Jean was teaching ChiRunning, a technique that I had never heard of. I have always hated running and had never really done much distance running before. After being coached by Jean for 3 months, I have a new found love for running and even saw almost 5 minutes drop off my two mile run. Running has never felt so good or been so enjoyable for me. I look forward to continue using the ChiRunning technique as I continue toward my fitness goals. I cannot thank Jean enough for bringing this technique to the Warrior FIT program." Paul Army National Guardsman

node.title: 10/10/19 Free Talk Jean Gillis - Clone
node._chi_workshop_description:
Run Better, Without Injury! Do you enjoy running, but always get injured? Does running feel to hard, and you become easily winded? Or are you a beginning runner and you're not sure where to start? Then I invite you to to this free introduction ChiRunning! This technique is a gentle but powerful approach that makes getting fit, safe, easy, and fun. It’s great for all levels of fitness and experience.
You don't need to be in full running gear, but please wear sneakers if you want to participate in the drills
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No cancellation policy as workshop is free.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "In May 2019, I was sent to the Massachusetts Army National Guard Warrior FIT program where I met Jean. Jean was teaching ChiRunning, a technique that I had never heard of. I have always hated running and had never really done much distance running before. After being coached by Jean for 3 months, I have a new found love for running and even saw almost 5 minutes drop off my two mile run. Running has never felt so good or been so enjoyable for me. I look forward to continue using the ChiRunning technique as I continue toward my fitness goals. I cannot thank Jean enough for bringing this technique to the Warrior FIT program." Paul Army National Guardsman

node._chi_workshop_name: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique
node.title: Introduction to ChiWalking and ChiRunning / Max Logan - Clone
node._chi_workshop_city: Orlando (Inside Disney World Resort, Lake Bueno Vista)
node._chi_workshop_description: Come hang out at Disney World and learn the most revolutionary fitness walk and running technique available. Learn how to run and fitness walk without the fear of injury and learn how to move your body with greater energy efficiency.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: FREE

node.title: Introduction to ChiWalking and ChiRunning / December 15, 2019 / ChiWalk-Run / Max Logan
node._chi_workshop_city: Orlando (Inside Disney World Resort, Lake Bueno Vista)
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come hang out at Disney World and learn the most revolutionary fitness walk and running technique available. Learn how to run and fitness walk without the fear of injury and learn how to move your body with greater energy efficiency.
This workshop is for all fitness levels. It is a 4 hour intensive workshop that includes one hour of free training.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Good Stuff! Can really help former high performing athletes who have been injured and given up running

node.title: 05/17-05/22/20 | ChiRunning & ChiWalking 5-day Course at Kripalu | Danny & Katherine Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
ChiRunning & ChiWalking: 5-day Course with Danny & Katherine Dreyer

For all levels. A favorite course at Kripalu for more than 10 years, ChiRunning and ChiWalking are practices based on the highly effective movement principles of tai chi, which can transform your relationship with running, walking, and everyday movement. In this program, ChiRunning founders Danny and Katherine Dreyer offer personal coaching and attention, helping you learn to
  • Optimize your alignment and breathing
  • Adapt your technique for roads and trails
  • Build a custom training program
  • Transition between walking and running with Chi Walk-Run
  • Experience running and walking as a mindful practice, and nature as a moving meditation.
Whether you’re a total beginner or a seasoned runner, these principles help you run and walk with flow and ease. Regardless of your age or level of conditioning, you can improve your enjoyment and performance while reducing your effort and taking your health and fitness to a whole new level.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: This course is sold through Kripalu– please review their refund/cancellation policies!

node.title: 01/04/2020 Chi Running Ed Malley
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run with great efficiency and reduce or even eliminate injuries for the rest of your life. In this Workshop, you will learn the essential skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, fun and inspiring. This workshop includes a VIDEO GAIT ANALYSIS at the beginning and conclusion of the workshop. Handouts and Ed's detailed analysis by email are also included. What you’ll get:
  • The Keys to Efficient, Injury-Eliminating Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • ChiRunning versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the ChiRunning Form
  • Injury Prevention Techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative Technique Drills
  • How to Conserve Energy at Any Speed
Please contact me (ed@runwalkcoach.com) if you have any questions regarding the workshop.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancel 14 days before the day of the workshop and I'll refund 100% of the workshop fee, or you can use it for a future workshop with me within one year with no penalty.
If you cancel within 14 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop with me within one year.
Should I need to reschedule the workshop (typically weather related), you can reschedule to another workshop or receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Thanks for the pictures and thanks for the workshop. Was fun, inspirational and very instructive. (After the workshop) I actually went for a 10k run…Came out feeling very refreshed and not sore at all.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Ed’s training helped me successfully start running again after 25 years. His chi training is superb and his passion for nature and people is contagious.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value: Running pain free for a 55 year old guy with 4 knee surgeries (not running related) is a miracle.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote30value: Today I did my first Chi long run (a 10-miler) and it felt great! For most of the run I felt like I could keep going forever. When I reached the end, my muscles and joints weren’t fatigued. It was really enjoyable. Thanks again for showing us the light.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Workshop @ Natick, MA - Indoor location!
node.title: 2/15/2020 - ChiRunning - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will sell out. Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop February 22, San Francisco
node.title: 02/22/20 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 16 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $135 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $145 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop May 16, San Francisco
node.title: 05/16/20 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 16 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $135 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $145 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick

  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
