  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node._chi_workshop_name: Introduction to ChiWalking and ChiRunning / Cancelled
node.title: Introduction to ChiWalking and ChiRunning / January 25, 2020 / ChiWalk-Run / Max Logan
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come hang out at beach and learn the most revolutionary fitness walk and running technique available. Learn how to run and fitness walk without the fear of injury and learn how to move your body with greater energy efficiency.
This workshop is for all fitness levels. It is a 4 hour intensive workshop that includes one hour of free training.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Good Stuff! Can really help former high performing athletes who have been injured and given up running

node._chi_workshop_name: Half Day ChiRunning Workshop - Colorado Springs CO
node.title: 2/22/20 Half Day ChiRunning Workshop Amelia Vrabel
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique. You will be guided through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you’re in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills… the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
No Pain, All Gain!!
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: Cancel 30 days before the workshop and you will be refunded your registration payment minus a $35 processing fee, or you can use the registration payment for a future workshop with Amelia Vrabel within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 30 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased with Amelia Vrabel within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop, in which case you will receive a full refund.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiWalking Workshop @ Attleboro, MA - Indoor location!
node.title: 2/8/2020 - ChiWalking - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will sell out. Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

  • Is This Workshop for Me?
    Yes! ChiWalking is beneficial for everyone, even those recovering from or managing illness or injury. The ChiWalking principles are covered in the first half of the running workshop. There will be no running during this time, but you will practice plenty of walking exercises & drills.
    You’ll Learn How To:
    • Maximize the power of your core to move forward.  Most walking injuries occur from the waist down. When we initiate movement from our core, the body’s largest muscle group, we don’t need to use our legs for propulsion. This greatly reduces impact, pain, and risk of injury. A strong core also improves posture, balance, and stability. • Unite your Upper Body and Lower Body. The Chi techniques are all about keeping your energy flowing so you can move efficiently. You’ll learn how to optimize your movement to keep the workload balanced between your Upper Body and Lower Body. • Get the results you want with fitness walking. With good body mechanics and relaxation techniques, you’ll improve your endurance and gain speed while preventing fatigue. You’ll be able to walk farther and faster with less effort so you can make your fitness goals a reality. • Plenty of Practice. You’ll practice walking drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node.title: 3/19/20 Free Talk Jean Gillis
node._chi_workshop_description:
Run Better, Without Injury! Do you enjoy running, but always get injured? Does running feel to hard, and you become easily winded? Or are you a beginning runner and you're not sure where to start? Then I invite you to to this free introduction ChiRunning! This technique is a gentle but powerful approach that makes getting fit, safe, easy, and fun. It’s great for all levels of fitness and experience.
You don't need to be in full running gear, but please wear sneakers if you want to participate in the drills
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No cancellation policy as workshop is free.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "In May 2019, I was sent to the Massachusetts Army National Guard Warrior FIT program where I met Jean. Jean was teaching ChiRunning, a technique that I had never heard of. I have always hated running and had never really done much distance running before. After being coached by Jean for 3 months, I have a new found love for running and even saw almost 5 minutes drop off my two mile run. Running has never felt so good or been so enjoyable for me. I look forward to continue using the ChiRunning technique as I continue toward my fitness goals. I cannot thank Jean enough for bringing this technique to the Warrior FIT program." Paul Army National Guardsman

node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node.title: 04/25/20 - ChiRunning - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.

Jean was teaching ChiRunning, a technique that I had never heard of. I have always hated running and had never really done much distance running before. After being coached by Jean for 3 months, I have a new found love for running and even saw almost 5 minutes drop off my two mile run. Running has never felt so good or been so enjoyable for me. I look forward to continue using the ChiRunning technique as I continue toward my fitness goals. I cannot thank Jean enough for bringing this technique to the Warrior FIT program." Paul Army National Guardsman

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Workshop @ Harvard University - Indoor location!
node.title: 4/18/2020 - ChiRunning - Marc Waxman
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Discount for Harvard staff/students
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node.title: 4/7/20 Free ChiRunning Talk Jean Gillis
node._chi_workshop_description:
Run Better, Without Injury! Do you enjoy running, but always get injured? Does running feel to hard, and you become easily winded? Or are you a beginning runner and you're not sure where to start? Then I invite you to to this free introduction ChiRunning! This technique is a gentle but powerful approach that makes getting fit, safe, easy, and fun. It’s great for all levels of fitness and experience.
You don't need to be in full running gear, but please wear sneakers if you want to participate in the drills
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: No cancellation policy as workshop is free.

node.title: 07/18/2020 Chi Running Ed Malley
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run with great efficiency and reduce or even eliminate injuries for the rest of your life. In this Workshop, you will learn the essential skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, fun and inspiring. This workshop includes a VIDEO GAIT ANALYSIS at the beginning and conclusion of the workshop. Handouts and Ed's detailed analysis by email are also included. What you’ll get:
  • The Keys to Efficient, Injury-Eliminating Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • ChiRunning versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the ChiRunning Form
  • Injury Prevention Techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative Technique Drills
  • How to Conserve Energy at Any Speed
Please contact me (ed@runwalkcoach.com) if you have any questions regarding the workshop.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancel 14 days before the day of the workshop and I'll refund 100% of the workshop fee, or you can use it for a future workshop with me within one year with no penalty.
If you cancel within 14 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop with me within one year.
Should I need to reschedule the workshop (typically weather related), you can reschedule to another workshop or receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Thanks for the pictures and thanks for the workshop. Was fun, inspirational and very instructive. (After the workshop) I actually went for a 10k run…Came out feeling very refreshed and not sore at all.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Ed’s training helped me successfully start running again after 25 years. His chi training is superb and his passion for nature and people is contagious.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value: Running pain free for a 55 year old guy with 4 knee surgeries (not running related) is a miracle.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote30value: Today I did my first Chi long run (a 10-miler) and it felt great! For most of the run I felt like I could keep going forever. When I reached the end, my muscles and joints weren’t fatigued. It was really enjoyable. Thanks again for showing us the light.

node.title: 10/3/20 | Chi Tune-up Session: ChiWalking | Marie Svet
node._chi_workshop_description:
Taken a ChiWalking Workshop, but need a quick refresher? Or, verification that your walking with the correct technique? Join Certified Instructor Marie Svet for a Chi Tune-up Session to ensure you're up to date on the latest teachings and walking with the best form possible! The ChiWalking technique emphasizes the proper biomechanics of walking including good posture, loose joints, engaging one’s core muscles, and relaxing the peripheral muscles of the arms and legs.

Registration is limited to 6 participants! This session will be taught outdoors to abide by social distancing guidelines.

node._chi_workshop_description:

node.title: 1/2-1/23/21 | ChiRunning Multi-Day Workshop | Beth Cline
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will be held every Saturday for four weeks. January 2nd and 23rd will be in person at a track; January 9th and 16th will be remote (via zoom).
node._chi_workshop_description: Come learn the basic components of the ChiRunning technique and move well for life! In this series, you will be guided through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you’re in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises, and technique drills… the nature of the series will be relaxed, full, and inspiring. We will spend two days together at a local track, and two days on-line via zoom. In person, we will video and practice drills to get the technique in your body. Via zoom, we will learn everything else! COVID19 Protocol: The instructor and participants will be required to follow the current recommendations on the dates of in-person sessions. The instructor will contact the participants with the most current recommendations prior to those dates. Saturdays: January 2nd, 9th, 16th & 23rd, 2021 from 9-10am $135. January 2nd and 23rd will be in person. January 9th & 16th will be remote (zoom).
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: Cancel 14 days before the workshop and you will be refunded your registration payment minus a $35 processing fee, or you can use the registration payment for a future workshop with Beth Cline within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 14 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased with Beth Cline within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop, in which case you will receive a full refund.

node.title: 5/8/2021 | ChiWalking Workshop | Beth Cline
node._chi_workshop_description:
ChiWalking Workshop

The ChiWalking technique applies principles from Tai Chi to recreational walking promoting energy efficiency and injury prevention. How you walk dictates how stress moves through your body while walking. Efficient walking technique distributes less stress on your body and requires less effort. Developing an efficient walking technique is an essential component in restoring or sustaining your walking practice. Efficient ChiWalking Technique can be learned through focused practice. A ChiWalking Clinic takes you through 3 steps to start developing the skill of efficient pain-free walking: 1) Understand the efficient components of ChiWalking 2) Feel efficient components of ChiWalking in your own body 3) Practice efficient ChiWalking Intro to ChiWalking Workshop consists of discussion, demonstration, drills and a small amount of walking making it perfect for individuals of all conditioning and experience levels interested in efficient walking. COVID19 Protocol: The instructor and participants will be required to follow the current recommendations on the dates of in-person sessions. The instructor will contact the participants with the most current recommendations prior to those dates.

node.title: 09/12/2021 | ChiWalking & ChiRunning Clinic - Joel Matalon
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Rain date Sunday, 9/19/21
node._chi_workshop_description:
The ChiWalking™ and ChiRunning™ techniques apply principles from Tai Chi to distance running and walking promoting energy efficiency and injury prevention. How you run/walk dictates how stress goes through your body.
These techniques:
- reduce stress on your body and require less effort when walking or running
- are essential components to restore or sustain your running/walking practice
Our clinic will cover:
  1. Principles of Tai Chi applied to distance running/walking
  2. Identify and create your customized perfect running/walking posture
  3. Pre-run Body Looseners & Tai Chi mobility movements inclusive of Core (Dantien) Strengtheners
  4. Create forward motion from your Dantien
  5. Learn an efficient/productive arm swing
  6. Gears, Stride Length, Cadence and Drills
 
The clinic consists of experiential discussion, demonstration and a small amount of running/walking making it perfect for individuals of all conditioning and experience levels.
 
Class will be limited to 12 participants to allow for individual instruction.
 
Add ons:
Fitness professionals/Running Coaches may advance purchase Continuing Education credits.
5 cec’s: $20
 
Comprehensive video analysis of your running/walking running technique:$50

node._chi_workshop_name: Taller de Tecnica de Carrera ChiRunning
node.title: 11/20-21/2021 | Taller de Tecnica de Carrera ChiRunning | Juan Pablo Arias Fortiz
node._chi_workshop_description:
Ya sea un corredor avanzado o un principiante, aprenderá a correr con eficiencia energética y a eliminar lesiones Lo guiaremos a través de muchos ejercicios y simulacros diseñados para dejarle una idea clara de cómo se siente la técnica ChiRunning en su cuerpo. No correremos mucho (al contrario de lo que puedas imaginar), así que no importa en qué condición te encuentres, no temas. Pasaremos tiempo alternando entre demostraciones, ejercicios divertidos y ejercicios de técnica. La naturaleza del día será relajada, divertida e inspiradora. Comprenderás y te iras con una sensación de:
  • Las claves para correr eficientemente y eliminar lesiones
  • ChiRunning versus Power Running
  • Un sentido interno del cuerpo para la forma ChiRunning
  • Técnicas de prevención de lesiones
  • Trucos y herramientas de registro personal
  • Antes de la carrera Estiramientos corporales, estiramientos posteriores a la carrera
  • Ejercicios para los músculos centrales
  • Cómo conservar energía a cualquier velocidad
All workshop participants get FREE access to The Run Show USA in Boston using the code: CHIRUNNING at checkout
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Política de cancelación:
En caso de cancelar 14 días antes del taller se le reembolsará su pago de inscripción menos una tarifa de procesamiento del 20% sobre la inversión dada, o podrá usar la inversión de la inscripción para un futuro taller de ChiRunning - ChiWalking con Fitness & Wellness dentro de un año a partir de la cancelación sin penalización alguna.
Si la cancelación se realiza dentro de los 14 días previos al taller, no podrá recibir reembolso alguno, pero la tarifa de la inversión se puede acreditar para un futuro taller de ChiRunning - ChiWalking comprado con con Fitness & Wellness dentro de un periodo de un año. Si cancela dentro de los dos días posteriores al taller, perderá el pago completo.
El instructor se reserva el derecho de cancelar / reprogramar el taller, en cuyo caso recibirá un reembolso completo.

I will contact you with those recommendations prior to the workshop. All workshop participants get FREE access to The Run Show USA in Boston using the code: CHIRUNNING at checkout
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy:
If you cancel 14 days or more before the workshop, I will refund your registration payment minus a $10 processing fee, or you can attend a future workshop with me within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 14 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the fee can be credited towards a future workshop with me within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop, you forfeit your full payment unless your slot is filled by another paying participant.
I do reserve the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop, in which case you will receive a full refund.

node._chi_workshop_name: Taller de Tecnica de Carrera ChiRunning
node.title: 01/29-30/2022 | Taller de Tecnica de Carrera ChiRunning | Juan Pablo Arias Fortiz
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Este taller se llevará a cabo en dos sesiones una el día sábado 29 de enero y la otra sesión el domingo 30 de enero. Ambas sesiones inician a las 9:00 am
node._chi_workshop_description:
Ya sea un corredor avanzado o un principiante, aprenderá a correr con eficiencia energética y a eliminar lesiones Lo guiaremos a través de muchos ejercicios y simulacros diseñados para dejarle una idea clara de cómo se siente la técnica ChiRunning en su cuerpo. No correremos mucho (al contrario de lo que puedas imaginar), así que no importa en qué condición te encuentres, no temas. Pasaremos tiempo alternando entre demostraciones, ejercicios divertidos y ejercicios de técnica. La naturaleza del día será relajada, divertida e inspiradora. Comprenderás y te iras con una sensación de:
  • Las claves para correr eficientemente y eliminar lesiones
  • ChiRunning versus Power Running
  • Un sentido interno del cuerpo para la forma ChiRunning
  • Técnicas de prevención de lesiones
  • Trucos y herramientas de registro personal
  • Antes de la carrera Estiramientos corporales, estiramientos posteriores a la carrera
  • Ejercicios para los músculos centrales
  • Cómo conservar energía a cualquier velocidad
$4397.00 pesos before january 9 - 2022. and $ 6000.00 pesos after january 9 - 2022
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Política de cancelación: En caso de cancelar 14 días antes del taller se le reembolsará su pago de inscripción menos una tarifa de procesamiento del 20% sobre la inversión dada, o podrá usar la inversión de la inscripción para un futuro taller de ChiRunning – ChiWalking con Fitness & Wellness dentro de un año a partir de la cancelación sin penalización alguna.
Si la cancelación se realiza dentro de los 14 días previos al taller, no podrá recibir reembolso alguno, pero la tarifa de la inversión se puede acreditar para un futuro taller de ChiRunning – ChiWalking comprado con con Fitness & Wellness dentro de un periodo de un año. Si cancela dentro de los dos días posteriores al taller, perderá el pago completo.
El instructor se reserva el derecho de cancelar / reprogramar el taller, en cuyo caso recibirá un reembolso completo.

node.title: ChiRunning Workshop | NYC, NY | 04/27/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Running Never Felt this Good!

Danny Dreyer, ultramarathoner, best- selling author, and ChiRunning founder, will share the keys to easier and enjoyable running. Assisted by a team of Certified Instructors, Danny will give you the personalized feedback you need to take your running form and practice to the next level.
Is this the workshop for me?
Yes! Runners and run-walkers of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites.
What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. Danny has combined his 20+ years of running and T’ai Chi practice to create a running technique that is proven to reduce impact*, which significantly reduces injury and risk of injury. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, it works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
  • Breathing Skills Learn effective breathing techniques to make running easier and energizing
  • The Scoop on Shoes Barefoot? Minimal? Stability? Danny is a running shoe tester and a true authority. He’ll explain your shoe options and how to choose the one that’s best for you.
  • Answers to All Your Running Questions There will be a Q&A during lunch, so bring all of your questions!
What You Need to Bring:
  • To maximize your learning experience, we recommend reading the first four chapters of the ChiRunning book and/or watching the ChiRunning DVD prior to your workshop.
  • Please bring your own lunch and water.
  • Wear running shoes, sunscreen, and weather appropriate clothing.

Win a Free Virtual Coaching Session with Danny!

When you sign up for Danny's workshops, you’ll automatically be entered in a drawing to win a free, 30-minute Virtual Coaching follow-up session with Danny – a $110 value. Danny will pull the winner’s name from a hat during the workshop. Once you’ve registered, ChiLiving® will send you an email receipt. Please provide the email you most commonly use during your checkout process to ensure that you receive all workshop emails. Workshop emails begin 4 weeks out from the workshop and are sent every Friday. If you are interested in scheduling a private workshop with Danny, click here to schedule a one or two-hour session. Please email Katherine@ChiLiving.com to set up your private workshop time. *Dr. Don Goss’s 2012 Univ. of North Carolina- Chapel Hill Study shows that ChiRunning reduces impact when compared to other common running forms.

node.title: ChiWalking Workshop | DEN, CO | 06/15/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Danny Dreyer, ultramarathoner, best- selling author, and ChiWalking® & ChiRunning® founder, will share the keys to easier and enjoyable walking. Assisted by a team of Certified Instructors, Danny will give you the personalized feedback you need to take your walking form and practice to the next level.
Is This Workshop for Me?
Yes! ChiWalking is beneficial for everyone, even those recovering from or managing illness or injury. The ChiWalking principles are covered in the first half of the running workshop. There will be no running during this time, but you will practice plenty of walking exercises & drills. If you’re inspired to try ChiRunning after experiencing how easy ChiWalking can be, you can choose to join the walk-run group and stay for the afternoon session for an additional $100.
You’ll Learn How To:
• Maximize the power of your core to move forward.  Most walking injuries occur from the waist down. When we initiate movement from our core, the body’s largest muscle group, we don’t need to use our legs for propulsion. This greatly reduces impact, pain, and risk of injury. A strong core also improves posture, balance, and stability. • Unite your Upper Body and Lower Body. The Chi techniques are all about keeping your energy flowing so you can move efficiently. You’ll learn how to optimize your movement to keep the workload balanced between your Upper Body and Lower Body. • Get the results you want with fitness walking. With good body mechanics and relaxation techniques, you'll improve your endurance and gain speed while preventing fatigue. You’ll be able to walk farther and faster with less effort so you can make your fitness goals a reality. • Plenty of Practice. You'll practice walking drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body. Lunch: Bring a lunch and join us for an hour of informal questions & answers.
What You Need To Bring:
• To maximize your learning experience, we recommend reading the ChiWalking book and/or watching the ChiWalking DVD prior to your workshop. • Please bring your own lunch and water. • Wear athletic shoes, sunscreen, and weather appropriate clothing. Once you have registered, ChiLiving® will send you an email receipt. Please provide the email that you most commonly use during your checkout process to ensure that you receive all Workshop emails. Workshop emails begin 4 weeks out from the Workshop and are sent every Friday. If you are interested in scheduling a private Workshop with Danny, click here to schedule a 1 or 2-hour session. Please email customerservice@chiliving.com to set up your private workshop time.

node._chi_workshop_name: Free Talk:Bringing Mindfulness to Your Favorite Outdoor Activity
node.title: Free Talk at REI Asheville | 06/06/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Join Danny Dreyer, Founder of ChiRunning, for a FREE Talk at REI Asheville!

Bringing Mindfulness to Your Favorite Outdoor Activity
There is so much more to be gained by approaching outdoor activities than simply a “Just do it!” attitude. In this month’s session Danny will show you what it means to take a mindful approach to outdoor activity. He’ll teach you how to deeply connect your breath with your movement, how to focus your mind in a productive way, and how to achieve better movement through the skills of body sensing and intentional relaxation. He’ll also show you how to conserve energy while running and hiking by moving from your center and redirecting the workload away from your legs. Don’t just DO your activity… grow from it.

node._chi_workshop_name: Free Talk: Picking the Best Footwear for Your Outdoor Activity
node.title: Free Talk at REI Asheville | 07/11/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Join Danny Dreyer, Founder of ChiRunning, for a FREE Talk at REI Asheville!

Picking the Best Footwear for Your Favorite Outdoor Activity
In any activity, your level of performance and enjoyment can be directly proportional to your choice of footwear. In this month’s session Danny will help you navigate the seemingly complex myriad of choices for picking the ideal footwear for YOU, depending on your activity, your fitness level and the requirements of your sport. You’ll come away with the skills to make the most mindful choice of footwear for any of your needs. Not recommended for fashionistas.

node._chi_workshop_name: Free Talk: Conditioning & Core Strength for Running & Hiking
node.title: Free Talk at REI Asheville | 08/08/19 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Join Danny Dreyer, Founder of ChiRunning, for a FREE Talk at REI Asheville!

Conditioning & Core Strength for Running & Hiking
The biggest way to prevent injury during outdoor activities is to pay close attention to your technique. In this month’s session Danny will be discussing walking and running technique. He’ll also be giving training tips for how to create a training program tailored to specifically match your current level of fitness and your fitness goals. This talk is for anyone at any level of fitness.

node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description In this workshop you will learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique and how to implement it in your body. We will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you're in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring.

Outline for the Day: 

Morning Session

  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Posture
  • Leading with your Dantien
  • ChWalking
  • Arm Swing
  • Stride Length/Leaning to Use Your Gears
  • Cadence
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercise
Lunch: Conversation over lunch as we answer your questions

Afternoon Session

  • Putting it all Together
  • ChiRunning
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Hills
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Your 3 Main Focuses Clarified!
Notes We will have a combo of indoor and outdoor time, so please bring appropriate clothing (layers). Feel free to bring water, light lunch and/or a snack.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Nailed My Form. I was so excited to find ChiRunning. Getting back into running as an adult was a little scary and I didn't know if I was doing it quite right. I did not have the time for pain, injuries or being out of commission, yet wanted to get back into shape... safely.  Sarah has helped me nail my form before injuries could crop up and I haven't looked back. She taught how to move my body with proper form and how to listen to my body.  I'm so glad that I can run with my friends and have been able to safely compete in races I never thought I could do!   ~Andrea
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Check. Check. Being a busy working mom, I wanted an activity I could do on the fly and I chose running. But I hadn't ever been a runner before. ChiRunning was the perfect place to start. Sarah helped me stay safe and sound while I trained for my first race ever, which was a half-marathon! As a teacher, she was extremely patient and made it so understandable and I could actually FEEL if I was doing it right or wrong. I'm so glad that I took the time to learn my form, it made all the the difference in the world.   ~Maureen

node.title: 07/14/19 ChiRunning Lisa Pozzoni
node._chi_workshop_venue: Residence in Dobson Ranch in Mesa (Guadalupe/Dobson)
node._chi_workshop_description:
I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body.  You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  You will also be videotaped at the beginning of the workshop.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills … the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!

node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: The ChiRunning Essentials class costs as much as a new pair of running shoes and you will get a lot more out of the class. I started running in my last 40’s and realized, after I got hurt, that I should have worked on my running form. The classes are a great way to evaluate and improve your form. If I had taken the class before I hurt my knee, I think the injury would not have happened. I have recommended the workshops to several friends.

node.title: 06/22/19 ChiRunning Lisa Pozzoni
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: 6 Week Technique Camp (Saturdays from 6-7am)
node._chi_workshop_venue: Residence in Dobson Ranch in Mesa (Guadalupe/Dobson)
node._chi_workshop_description:
Summer is a great time to deepen your running practice and get prepared for those fall races. This a perfect program for any ChiRunner wanting a good review of all the form focuses or someone wanting to learn the ChiRunning technique and get lots of practice. (LIMIT 8 PEOPLE) We will be following the 6 Week ChiRunning Injury-Free Intermediate 5K plan. Once plan is purchased via Final Surge, you will have a free athlete account.  Week 1: Lesson: Posture Goal: Get Aligned, Feel Aligned Week 2: Lesson: Engage your Core Goal: Moving from your Center Week 3: Lesson: Lean Goal: Engage Gravity & Cadence Week 4: Lesson: Lower Body Goal: The Passive Lower Leg: Foot Placement, Stride Length Week 5: Lesson: Upper Body Goal: Have your Upper Body Join the Fun! Week 6: Lesson: Upper Body & Lower Body Goal: Put it all together! Included in fee: Facebook Group: A place for all participants to share experiences, ask questions, stay accountable to the 6 week plan. Access to my TRU Workout Portal which includes strength training and stretching routines: Get access to strength training workouts and stretching routines for runners. These include a variety of workouts from corrective exercise, to strength training, foam rolling, etc. I have pre approved all the workouts and they are easy to follow with videos. Weekly Technique Training and Running: We will meet weekly. I will teach the material for the week and then we will run for 30 minutes practicing while I’ll be coaching participants individually.  Saturdays 6/22-7/27 from 6-7am Video Analysis- I will video record participants at the group workouts in Week 1. I will send those videos to you online with my comments so you will always have something to review.
$129 First Timers $99 Alumni
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "The ChiRunning Essentials class costs as much as a new pair of running shoes and you will get a lot more out of the class. I started running in my last 40’s and realized, after I got hurt, that I should have worked on my running form. The classes are a great way to evaluate and improve your form. If I had taken the class before I hurt my knee, I think the injury would not have happened. I have recommended the workshops to several friends." ~ Charles

node.title: 07/27/19 Chirunning workshop Angela James
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Chirunning Workshop in 100 mile house British Columbia Canada is hosted by Kristi Iverson: Contact info e-mail iversonkristi@gmail.com cell: 1-2503967403
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
“Angela's chi running workshop gave me some remarkable feedback that has made a huge difference in my running. She figured out that I was turning out too much when I was placing my foot on the ground. She could see this clearly when did an exercise in the sand. After that, I worked on my pronation to make it more habitual to have the proper foot placement. Since that time, I have not had any of the associated pain in the Achilles or calf muscles which I used to experience. If any pain occurs, I just think of the foot placement and it goes away instantly. I have been running for over 45 years so having such an easy solution was well worth the investment in the course.”

Richard Hastings, Vancouver, BC

node.title: 08/10/19 ChiWalk-Run Workshop
node.excerpt: “I connected with Angela around my plan to complete a pilgrimage walk. Angela's experience, commitment, and enthusiasm are remarkable. And, the spiritual and embodied mindfulness aspects of ChiWalking are a serendipitously perfect fit! Within six private coaching sessions, that I shared with a friend, I improved my posture and alignment, and learned to walk quickly and with ease, by engaging core muscles and using pelvic rotation. In each session, Angela coached on broad aspects of working with chi and mindfulness, as well as individual walking technique and practice. Working with Angela to learn the principles of ChiWalking has been a great experience.” Dianne Westwood, Vancouver, BC
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
“I connected with Angela around my plan to complete a pilgrimage walk. Angela's experience, commitment, and enthusiasm are remarkable. And, the spiritual and embodied mindfulness aspects of ChiWalking are a serendipitously perfect fit! Within six private coaching sessions, that I shared with a friend, I improved my posture and alignment and learned to walk quickly and with ease, by engaging core muscles and using pelvic rotation. In each session, Angela coached on broad aspects of working with chi and mindfulness, as well as individual walking technique and practice. Working with Angela to learn the principles of ChiWalking has been a great experience.”

Dianne Westwood, Vancouver, BC

node.title: Chirunning Workshop 09/21/19
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: “Angela's an amazing coach and her ChiRunning clinic is life-changing. I'd been doing the hilly Whidbey Island Marathon for a few years but after taking Angela's ChiRunning retreat in July 2011, my 2012 marathon experience was unforgettable. For the first time ever, I finished with 'happy feet' and truly felt great. It took all my focus to stay relaxed and to remember to BREATHE but Angela's clinic, combined with reading Danny Dreyer's book, was revolutionary. If you think about it, we're taught how to swim, how to ride a bike, sometimes, how to skate and how to ski, etc. So why are we never taught how to run? No wonder "running injuries" are so prevalent. Thank You, Angela, for spreading the good news!” Melissa Chaun, BC Canada

node.title: ChiRunning - Half-Day Workshop - Clone
node._chi_workshop_description:
Synasoma at Resilience CrossFit welcomes ChiRunning!  This workshop will be taught both indoors and outdoor (weather permitting). We will begin at 9:00am and end at 12:30pm. Come learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique. You will be guided through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you're in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!

node.title: 10/26/19 ChiRunning Lisa Holloway
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description

You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life.

 

In this Workshop, you will learn the essential foundation skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.

 

What you’ll get:

• The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running

• The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs

• ChiRunning versus Power Running

• Introduction to the ChiRunning Form

• Injury prevention techniques

• Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools

• Core Muscle Drills and Exercises

• Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches

• Innovative technique drills

• How to conserve energy at any speed

 

Please contact me if you have any questions regarding the workshop.

node._chi_workshop_name: Chi Walk-Run International workshop in NYC
node.title: ChiWalk/Run International Workshop NYC
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Option to include Sunday August 18th workshop 9 am to 1 pm If taking workshop on both days $290
node._chi_workshop_description: 2019 CHI WALKING/CHI RUNNING INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP Instructors: ALAN GARDNER – NYC, USA (HOST) ANGELA JAMES - VANCOUVER, CA. (MASTER INSTRUCTOR)                            PENNY CHRISTIE - SYDNEY, AUS.                            ALESSANDRO TAVARES – SAO PAOLO, BR. Day 1: Saturday, August 17: 9 a.m. – 4 p.m. Day 2: Sunday, August 18: 9 a.m. – 1 p.m. VENUE:  HUDSON RIVER PARK, MANHATTAN – TBA Cost:  Level 1 (Saturday only) - $200 Both days - $290 Chi Walking and Chi Running are T’ai Chi-based meditational movement practices that make walking and running more energy efficient while promoting relaxation with increased speed, heightened awareness and injury prevention.  Enjoy moving, stay healthier and boost your speed factor! Get your Chi on with this global group of talented instructors, learn how to body sense, set up posture, and create streamlined movement! Local contact:  Alan Gardner @ joyfulrunnerag@gmail.com; 917-710-7168
node._chi_workshop_instr_name: Alan Gardner, AngelaJames, Penny Christie, Alessandro Tavares
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
October 16, 2018

“Angela James and ChiRunning changed my life! Sounds dramatic, but being in advertising, I've often bought into and sold the expectation of change as a big dramatic flash-bang moment. In fact, it's the quiet, joyful realization that not only did I PR my 36th marathon, but I enjoyed every moment of the sunny autumn run. Recovery was negligible, and it's all because of the springtime ChiRunning courses with Angela and her weekly Chi Runs, which are immensely valuable in practicing good chi form. Angela's advice, specific to the lesson on shoulders, "to relax, stop trying so hard and just be", has been something of a game changer in my running and life. So dramatics aside, ChiRunning delivered through Angela who, everyone will agree, is a bundle of positive energy, is life changing in a perfect chi-footsteps-in-the-sand way.”

Melanie Last

node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Check. Check. Being a busy working mom, I wanted an activity I could do on the fly and I chose running. But I hadn't ever been a runner before. ChiRunning was the perfect place to start. Sarah helped me stay safe and sound while I trained for my first race ever, which was a half-marathon! As a teacher, she was extremely patient and made it so understandable and I could actually FEEL if I was doing it right or wrong. I'm so glad that I took the time to learn my form, it made all the the difference in the world.   ~Maureen

node.title: 07/21/19-ChiRunning Clinic-Sarah Richardson
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Enjoy your drive through the Champlain Islands to attend this full day clinic.
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description In this workshop you will learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique and how to implement it in your body. We will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you're in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring.  

Outline for the Day: 

Morning Session

  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Posture
  • Leading with your Dantien
  • ChWalking
  • Arm Swing
  • Stride Length/Leaning to Use Your Gears
  • Cadence
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercise
Lunch: Conversation over lunch as we answer your questions

Afternoon Session

  • Putting it all Together
  • ChiRunning
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Hills
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Your 3 Main Focuses Clarified!
Notes We will have a combo of indoor and outdoor time, so please bring appropriate clothing (layers). Feel free to bring water, light lunch and/or a snack.

node.excerpt: Get your Chi on with this global group of instructors: Angela James (Certified Master Instructor, Vancouver, CA); Penny Christie (Certified Instructor, Sydney, Australia); Alessandro Tavares (Certified Instructor, Sao Paolo, Brazil); Alan Gardner (Host Certified Instructor, New York, NY, USA). node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Option to attend full day Saturday for $200 or both days (full day Saturday/half day Sunday) for $290
node._chi_workshop_address: Hudson River Park-location to be announced
node._chi_workshop_description: Chi Walking and Chi Running are T'ai Chi-based meditational movement practices that make walking and running more energy efficient while promoting relaxation with increased speed, heightened awareness and injury prevention.  Enjoy moving, stay healthier and boost your speed factor! For more information, contact the Host Instructor, Alan Gardner, at 917-710-7168 or joyfulrunnerag@gmail.com... Or just sign up for a great workshop...come for one or both days, though there is a great benefit to the learning, progress and fun you will enjoy by enrolling for both sessions! August 2019 Workshop Flyer
node._chi_workshop_instr_name: Alan Gardner, Angela James, Penny Christie, Alessandro Tavares

node.title: ChiWalking Workshop | NYC, NY | 10/4/20 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Danny Dreyer, ultramarathoner, best- selling author, and ChiWalking® & ChiRunning® founder, will share the keys to easier and enjoyable walking. Assisted by a team of Certified Instructors, Danny will give you the personalized feedback you need to take your walking form and practice to the next level.
Is This Workshop for Me?
Yes! ChiWalking is beneficial for everyone, even those recovering from or managing illness or injury. The ChiWalking principles are covered in the first half of the running workshop. There will be no running during this time, but you will practice plenty of walking exercises & drills. If you’re inspired to try ChiRunning after experiencing how easy ChiWalking can be, you can choose to join the walk-run group and stay for the afternoon session for an additional $100.
You’ll Learn How To:
• Maximize the power of your core to move forward.  Most walking injuries occur from the waist down. When we initiate movement from our core, the body’s largest muscle group, we don’t need to use our legs for propulsion. This greatly reduces impact, pain, and risk of injury. A strong core also improves posture, balance, and stability. • Unite your Upper Body and Lower Body. The Chi techniques are all about keeping your energy flowing so you can move efficiently. You’ll learn how to optimize your movement to keep the workload balanced between your Upper Body and Lower Body. • Get the results you want with fitness walking. With good body mechanics and relaxation techniques, you'll improve your endurance and gain speed while preventing fatigue. You’ll be able to walk farther and faster with less effort so you can make your fitness goals a reality. • Plenty of Practice. You'll practice walking drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body. Lunch: Bring a lunch and join us for an hour of informal questions & answers.
What You Need To Bring:
• To maximize your learning experience, we recommend reading the ChiWalking book and/or watching the ChiWalking DVD prior to your workshop. • Please bring your own lunch and water. • Wear athletic shoes, sunscreen, and weather appropriate clothing. Once you have registered, ChiLiving® will send you an email receipt. Please provide the email that you most commonly use during your checkout process to ensure that you receive all Workshop emails. Workshop emails begin 4 weeks out from the Workshop and are sent every Friday. If you are interested in scheduling a private Workshop with Danny, click here to schedule a 1 or 2-hour session. Please email customerservice@chiliving.com to set up your private workshop time.

node.title: ChiRunning Workshop | NYC, NY | 10/4/20 | Danny Dreyer
node._chi_workshop_description:
Running Never Felt this Good!

Danny Dreyer, ultramarathoner, best- selling author, and ChiRunning founder, will share the keys to easier and enjoyable running. Assisted by a team of Certified Instructors, Danny will give you the personalized feedback you need to take your running form and practice to the next level.
Is this the workshop for me?
Yes! Runners and run-walkers of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites.
What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. Danny has combined his 20+ years of running and T’ai Chi practice to create a running technique that is proven to reduce impact*, which significantly reduces injury and risk of injury. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, it works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
  • Breathing Skills Learn effective breathing techniques to make running easier and energizing
  • The Scoop on Shoes Barefoot? Minimal? Stability? Danny is a running shoe tester and a true authority. He’ll explain your shoe options and how to choose the one that’s best for you.
  • Answers to All Your Running Questions There will be a Q&A during lunch, so bring all of your questions!
What You Need to Bring:
  • To maximize your learning experience, we recommend reading the first four chapters of the ChiRunning book and/or watching the ChiRunning DVD prior to your workshop.
  • Please bring your own lunch and water.
  • Wear running shoes, sunscreen, and weather appropriate clothing.

Win a Free Virtual Coaching Session with Danny!

When you sign up for Danny's workshops, you’ll automatically be entered in a drawing to win a free, 30-minute Virtual Coaching follow-up session with Danny – a $110 value. Danny will pull the winner’s name from a hat during the workshop. Once you’ve registered, ChiLiving® will send you an email receipt. Please provide the email you most commonly use during your checkout process to ensure that you receive all workshop emails. Workshop emails begin 4 weeks out from the workshop and are sent every Friday. If you are interested in scheduling a private workshop with Danny, click here to schedule a one or two-hour session. Please email Katherine@ChiLiving.com to set up your private workshop time. *Dr. Don Goss’s 2012 Univ. of North Carolina- Chapel Hill Study shows that ChiRunning reduces impact when compared to other common running forms.

node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Thanks for the pictures and thanks for the workshop. Was fun, inspirational and very instructive. (After the workshop) I actually went for a 10k run…Came out feeling very refreshed and not sore at all.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Ed’s training helped me successfully start running again after 25 years. His chi training is superb and his passion for nature and people is contagious.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value: Running pain free for a 55 year old guy with 4 knee surgeries (not running related) is a miracle.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote30value: Today I did my first Chi long run (a 10-miler) and it felt great! For most of the run I felt like I could keep going forever. When I reached the end, my muscles and joints weren’t fatigued. It was really enjoyable. Thanks again for showing us the light.

node.title: 11/02/19 Chi Running Workshop Ann-Marie Giglio
node._chi_workshop_description:
Learn to Run Injury-Free. Forever. ChiRunning® is designed to teach you bio-mechanically correct and efficient running.
No matter the distance you run, if you've been injured, learn how to eliminate the causes. If you're a triathlete, you'll love this because when they get off the bike, you won't need your legs. If you're an ultra runner, you'll become much more efficient. If you're a beginner, this is a great place to start.
This hands-on workshop teach you the fundamental techniques and answer all of your questions.
Wear comfortable clothes and the shoes you normally run in. Bring water and snacks.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "I practiced for two weeks and ran the Women's Publix Run Saturday and placed first our of 246 in my age division! I did notice a BIG improvement in my time from last year and had a lot more fun also. Thank you again!"
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: "In the 2 years since I took your workshop, I am still injury free. That includes over 2200 miles of running. I tell all my running friends about your class. Thanks again"

node.title: 11/02/19 Chi Walking Workshop Ann-Marie Giglio
node._chi_workshop_description:
Ever finish a walk with sore knees, calves or a backache–or even a headache? Become a Chi Walker and make pain a thing of the past! ChiWalking® is the efficient, injury-free way to walk by using bio-mechanically correct alignment. We eliminate overuse and impact. Each workshop covers the method’s five steps:
  • Get Aligned
  • Engage your core
  • Create balance
  • Make a choice
  • Move forward
Wear comfortable clothes and the shoes you normally walk in. Bring water and snacks.

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning and ChiWalking Half Day Workshop
node.title: RUNhabX Training in West Hartford, CT
node._chi_workshop_description:
What if your running issues become your strengths?

What if you ran faster by reducing leg usage?

What if running was your expression of play, dance and meditation?

  Led by Roger Thompson of RUNhabX Learn and experience the foundation of ChiRunning and ChiWalking combined with professional running training drills, skills, and the fun of RUNhabX. - You’ll have more fun with every run! - You’ll release unnecessary weight - Good for ANY fitness level and age Roger Thompson is a certified ChiRunning/ChiWalking instructor and an ACE certified personal trainer who has been mentored by RUNhabX creator Joel Matalon.  He has studied Wholistic Wellness and Exercise Science at the Master’s program at Skidmore College and is an experienced marathoner, and is active in Yoga and practices meditations. Joel Mataon creator of RUNhabX has been a global fitness presenter since 1989. He is a Master Chi Running™, Chi Walking™ instructor, certifying Master, and is the Director of Continuing Education at ChiLiving, Inc.  He’s an ACE life and health coach, personal trainer and group fitness instructor. He’s also an ISSA Youth Fitness coach, Spartan Race™ coach and Speedball Fitness™ coach. Original Strength™ Coach. Can’t make this event and interested in professional training/coaching, email RUNHbx@joefitnessworld.com Register by Sept 6th: $149.00 After Sept 6th: $199.00 Walk-in on day of: $225 cash only

node.title: 10/26/19 ChiWalk/Run workshop Angela James
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop is open to all levels of runners and walkers
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
WHAT I RAN AWAY WITH...

October 23, 2018

“The opportunity to experience Angela's ChiRunning workshop was a serendipitous chain of good fortune. I have never been coached in running. I run to support my eating habit, run through problems and keep my dogs company. What was there to learn? Angela's approach is embodying – mindfully. An accomplished runner, Angela has the running faith and the wisdom to know there is more to running than a good pair of shoes and pavement. Patient in her instruction, she tells why ChiRunning is important, what benefits it brings and how it improves performance. Before and after videos reveal your personal running story – step by step. Am I a ChiRunner? While I have adopted ChiRunning techniques and listen more to my body, positively I now consider myself an informed conscious runner. I am glad I took Angela's course, the experience was a perfect blend of land, sea, learning and wanting more.”

Heather Walker, Vancouver, BC

node.title: 10/27/19 Chirunning level 2 Angela James
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop is for those who have taken the foundational Chirun/walk workshop
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I COULD NOT HAVE ENJOYED THAT WORKSHOP MORE...

May 16, 2018

“That was a gas, rain or no rain. I could not have enjoyed that workshop more, you are an excellent instructor, excellent communication (and you play the cello as well!), good business model from what I could see, at some point I'll re-connect, it was absolutely lovely meeting you, thank you for the links, Angela, and all the best in your work.”

Brian, Vancouver, BC

node._chi_workshop_name: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique
node.title: FREE! Introducing the ChiWalking and ChiRunning Technique / 11-23-19 / ChiWalk-Run / Max Logan
node._chi_workshop_description:
Come learn how the most revolutionary running and fitness walking technique, ChiRunning and ChiWalking will change how you view the effects of injury and energy efficiency on your workout practice.
You will learn the difference between traditional running and fitness walking and how the ChiRunning and ChiWalking technique will allow you take your practice to a whole new level without the fear of injury and with greater stamina as your body moves more efficiently.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I could't believe how light I was on my feet after learning the ChiWalk-Run technique. I am a triathlete and my worst even was the run. I hated it! But now that I have learned the technique, I am up for the challenge.
Marcus M.

node.title: 11/09/19 Half Day ChiRunning Jean Gillis
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description

In this Workshop, you will learn the essential foundation skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills. The nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.

 

What you’ll get:

• The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running

• The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs

• ChiRunning versus Power Running

• Introduction to the ChiRunning Form

• Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools

• Pre-run Body Looseners

• Innovative Technique Drills

• Running with Cadence

• Tips for Running Hills, Breathing, Being Light on Your Feet • Creating Your Training Plan

 Please contact me if you have any questions regarding the workshop.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: “In May 2019, I was sent to the Massachusetts Army National Guard Warrior FIT program where I met Jean. Jean was teaching ChiRunning, a technique that I had never heard of. I have always hated running and had never really done much distance running before. After being coached by Jean for 3 months, I have a new found love for running and even saw almost 5 minutes drop off my two mile run. Running has never felt so good or been so enjoyable for me. I look forward to continue using the ChiRunning technique as I continue toward my fitness goals. I cannot thank Jean enough for bringing this technique to the Warrior FIT program.” Paul Army National Guardsman

node.title: 1/25/20 Chi Running Workshop Ann-Marie Giglio
node._chi_workshop_description:
Learn to Run Injury-Free. Forever. ChiRunning® is designed to teach you bio-mechanically correct and efficient running.
No matter the distance you run, if you've been injured, learn how to eliminate the causes. If you're a triathlete, you'll love this because when they get off the bike, you won't need your legs. If you're an ultra runner, you'll become much more efficient. If you're a beginner, this is a great place to start.
This hands-on workshop teach you the fundamental techniques and answer all of your questions.
Wear comfortable clothes and the shoes you normally run in. Bring water and snacks.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "I practiced for two weeks and ran the Women's Publix Run Saturday and placed first our of 246 in my age division! I did notice a BIG improvement in my time from last year and had a lot more fun also. Thank you again!"
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: "In the 2 years since I took your workshop, I am still injury free. That includes over 2200 miles of running. I tell all my running friends about your class. Thanks again"

node.title: 4/25/20 Chi Walking Workshop Ann-Marie Giglio
node._chi_workshop_description:
Ever finish a walk with sore knees, calves or a backache–or even a headache? Become a Chi Walker and make pain a thing of the past! ChiWalking® is the efficient, injury-free way to walk by using bio-mechanically correct alignment. We eliminate overuse and impact. Each workshop covers the method’s five steps:
  • Get Aligned
  • Engage your core
  • Create balance
  • Make a choice
  • Move forward
Wear comfortable clothes and the shoes you normally walk in. Bring water and snacks.

node.title: Turkey Trot Chi Running Traning
node._chi_workshop_venue: All sessions at Belanger Field Track 375 Newell Street in Pittsfield, MA 1201
node._chi_workshop_description:
Walk or run your Turkey Trot with improved ease and without injury. Hajime CHI is offering a Turkey Trot Chi Walking and Chi Running Training program to get you ready! Program consists of 2-two hour training sessions and 3 one hour sessions including video analysis.
First Session: Friday 10/25/19m from 4pm to 6pm
Second Session: Saturday 11/2/1+9 from 12pm to 2pm
Third Session: Saturday 11/9/19 from 12pm to 1pm
Fourth Session: Saturday 11/16/19 from 12pm to 1pm
Fifth Session: Saturday 11/23/19 from 12pm to 1pm
For registration contact Sensei Roger at 518-212-0726 or at Rogerthompsonchi@gmail.com

node.title: 01/04/20 ChiRunning Lisa Holloway
node._chi_workshop_map_url: Crown Point Park Crown Point Dr, San Diego, CA 92109 (619) 525-8213 https://goo.gl/maps/RxWNjyweYuuR3xVT9
node._chi_workshop_description:
You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life.

 

In this Workshop, you will learn the essential foundation skills for your ChiRunning Technique. I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiRunning technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.

 

What you’ll get:

• The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running

• The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs

• ChiRunning versus Power Running

• Introduction to the ChiRunning Form

• Injury prevention techniques

• Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools

• Core Muscle Drills and Exercises

• Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches

• Innovative technique drills

• How to conserve energy at any speed

 

Please contact me if you have any questions regarding the workshop.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Feb 15, 2018

My terrific ChiRunning Class

https://generationfit.club/my-terrific-chirunning-workshop/

node.title: ChiRunning - Half-Day Workshop - Clone
node._chi_workshop_description:
Synasoma at Resilience CrossFit welcomes ChiRunning!  This workshop will be taught both indoors and outdoor (weather permitting). We will begin at 9:00am and end at 12:30pm. Come learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique. You will be guided through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you're in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!

node.title: 01/25/20 ChiWalking Lisa Holloway
node._chi_workshop_map_url: Crown Point Park Crown Point Dr, San Diego, CA 92109 (619) 525-8213 https://goo.gl/maps/vndn7GR4dN2fk6WJ9
node._chi_workshop_description:
In this workshop you will learn the essential foundation skills for your ChiWalking Technique.

I will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the ChiWalking technique feels like in your body. We won't be doing a lot of walking. The focus will be on building a solid base of knowledge that you will carry forward in your walking program. You'll get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you walk in balance for the rest of your life.

 

Create balance in your body and yourself with ChiWalking. ChiWalking will teach you to move from your center, your core, and not use your legs to walk!! You'll learn proper body alignment and movement techniques that will give you a powerful sense of balance and stability, as well as relaxation and spaciousness in your body and mind.

 

What you'll get:

• Introduction to the ChiWalking method

• Injury-prevention techniques

• Core muscle drills and exercises

• Upper body and lower body usage

• Personal check-in tricks and tools

• Innovative technique drills

• How to relax and conserve energy at any walking speed

• Handouts of all the material covered in the workshop

 

Please contact me if you have any questions regarding the workshop
